name: Guild Alliance Formation
description: Form strategic alliances with other guilds to strengthen your position!
Unite with like-minded guilds for mutual benefit and protection.

dialogs.start: In these turbulent times, alliances are crucial for survival and prosperity.
dialogs.preparation: We need to prepare diplomatic gifts and formal documents for negotiations.
dialogs.negotiation: Diplomacy requires patience and skill. Choose your words carefully.
dialogs.ceremony: Today marks the beginning of a new era of cooperation between our guilds!
dialogs.benefits: With our alliance formed, we can face any challenge together!
dialogs.complete: Your diplomatic efforts have secured valuable alliances for our guild!
